definition: to move (i.e. relocate oneself)/to move (sth relatively heavy or bulky)/to shift/to copy indiscriminately
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)

sentences.english: Sad about the move, I bicycled down the hill to Helen's.
sentences.chinese: 因爲要搬走，我很傷心，騎車下山來到海倫家。

sentences.english: Live in Northern California once, but leave before it makes you soft.
sentences.chinese: 去北加州住一陣子，但在心神松懶前搬走。

sentences.english: My next door neighbour is moving out next week.
sentences.chinese: 下週我隔壁的鄰居就要搬走了。

sentences.english: Margie lived alone. Her daughter had grown up and moved away.
sentences.chinese: 瑪吉是個單身女人，她的女兒成年後搬走了。

sentences.english: Laith and his family moved out of the house.
sentences.chinese: 萊思和他的家人後來就搬走了。

sentences.english: Then they took away the tiny little bed, and Thumbelina was left alone.
sentences.chinese: 他們搬走了小牀，把拇指姑娘一個人留在那裏。

sentences.english: My sister, I am sure, will not hear of her removal.
sentences.chinese: 我相信我的妹妹也決計不肯讓她搬走的。

sentences.english: The image of the Patroness of the Church was wrenched out of the porch centuries ago.
sentences.chinese: 教堂的守護神像早在幾百年前就從門廊裏搬走了。

sentences.english: But the summer is determined not to move.
Feeling sad because a good friend has moved away?
sentences.chinese: 因爲一位好朋友要搬走，你感覺有些難過？

sentences.english: Ritual one step out of the house, immediately make a chopped du yuan room move such as medicinal materials.
sentences.chinese: 佳期一踏出家門，杜茸立即讓一元等進屋搬走藥材。

sentences.english: "Let's move that bag, or there may be an accident. " said Li Lei.
sentences.chinese: “我們搬走那包米，要不會出交通事故的”，李壘說。

sentences.english: or a lot of times you just know someone who's leaving  and you take their place.
sentences.chinese: 或者你知道有人要搬走，你可以住他們的地方。

sentences.english: He offering to lend source, but creditors, stalking rimmon goods move.
sentences.chinese: 玥主動借錢給源，但債主臨門，要脅將貨搬走。

sentences.english: When the tailer moved away, I started to look for cheaper options.
sentences.chinese: 自從這個裁縫師傅搬走後，我便開始尋找其他便宜的。

sentences.english: It did not perceive that it also lay in that hand which had removed Napoleon.
sentences.chinese: 它沒有看出它是被捏在搬走拿破崙的那同一隻手裏。

definition: to move (i.e. relocate oneself)/to move (sth relatively heavy or bulky)/to shift/to copy indiscriminately
to sell off/to get rid of in a sale
to hire/to rent/to charter/to rent out/to lease out/rent/land tax
rent for a room or house
to put in order/to tidy up/to pack/to repair/(coll.) to sort sb out/to fix sb
to repair (sth broken)/to restore (sth damaged)/to establish friendly relations with/(literary) to do meritorious deeds
to level/to raze to the ground
to tear open/to tear down/to tear apart/to open
